text:
Parineeti Chopra (; born 22 October 1988) is an Indian actress and singer.
Chopra appeared in her first movie with the 2011 romantic comedy "Ladies vs Ricky Bahl". She later starred in "Ishaqzaade" (2012), "Shuddh Desi Romance" (2013) and "Hasee Toh Phasee" (2014), "Golmaal Again" (2017) and the war drama "Kesari" (2019).
